scripts.package:sls: SLS_DEBUG=* npm run sls package -- --verbose --stage dev --package ./package
scripts.sls-deploy: env-cmd npm run sls deploy -- --stage dev --verbose --package ./package
scripts.build-and-ship: npm run package && npm run sls-deploy
scripts.show: env-cmd aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name aws-serverless-backend-dev --query Stacks[0].Outputs
scripts.show:userPoolId: env-cmd aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name aws-serverless-backend-dev --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`UserPoolId`].OutputValue' --output text
scripts.show:userPoolClientId: env-cmd aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name aws-serverless-backend-dev --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`UserPoolClientId`].OutputValue' --output text
